âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Visual, low-code interface for building AI agents and workflows
ðŸ“– Summary: Flowise is a low-code/no-code platform that allows users to visually build, deploy, and manage custom AI agents and complex workflows using Large Language Models (LLMs) like OpenAI and LangChain. It provides a drag-and-drop interface to connect various components (nodes) for tasks such as RAG, chatbot creation, and workflow automation. The platform is self-hostable and built as a monorepository using TypeScript, React, and Node.js.
